Package com.polarion.platform.jobs.spi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IJobContextService<U>  
    IJobScopeHandler
    Handler which is able to construct job scope (see IJobUnit.getScope() from string.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractJobParameter
    Abstract IJobDescriptor.IJobParameter.
    AbstractJobUnit
    Abstract base for IJobUnits.
    ArrayJobParameter
    Simple array IJobDescriptor.IJobParameter.
    BasicJobDescriptor
    IJobDescriptor implementation which is not hidden and presents only one (root) group.
    DotStatusFileCreator
    Base of .status file creator in the form of job listener.
    GenericJobUnitFactory
    Simple and easy-to-reuse implementation of IJobUnitFactory.
    HiddenJobDescriptor
    IJobDescriptor implementation intended for hidden jobs (not shown to the user in scheduler UI and similar places).
    JobParameterPrimitiveType
    IJobDescriptor.IJobParameterPrimitiveType implementation.
    LocationJobParameter
    IJobDescriptor.IJobParameter of type ILocation.
    NullProgressMonitor
    Does nothing, to be used when no progress monitor is passed to client code.
    PropertiesJobParameter
    IJobDescriptor.IJobParameter implementation which holds values of type Properties.
    SimpleJobParameter
    Simple IJobDescriptor.IJobParameter.
